text:
HOW WAS YOUR LAST DAY
OF SCHOOL, ALEX?
OH, TOUGH.

SO MANY PEOPLE WERE
SIGNING MY YEARBOOK,
I RAN OUT OF ROOM.

I HAD TO GET
A SECOND YEARBOOK.

HOW DID YOU GET
A SECOND YEARBOOK?
THEY'RE ALL GONE.

WHERE IS
MY YEARBOOK, ALEX?

COME ON, JUSTIN.
HARDLY ANYBODY SIGNED IT.
AND ONE OF THEM WAS YOU.

MAYBE I WAS SAVING ROOM
FOR FRIENDS.
LIKE WHO?

VICE-PRINCIPAL CLEMENTS,
EARL THE CROSSING GUARD,

MY BIOLOGY TEACHER,
AND ALL THE LADIES
IN THE FRONT OFFICE.

SO, BASICALLY,
ALL YOUR FRIENDS ARE ADULTS.

YEAH, WELL,
I FIT IN BEST WITH ADULTS.
I'M VERY MATURE.

Man on P.A.:
WILL JUSTIN RUSSO
REPORT TO LOST AND FOUND?

WE HAVE YOUR CAPE
AND LIGHTSABER.
HMM.

I CAN'T BELIEVE THEY FOUND
WHERE I HID THOSE.

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THAT THE END WILL NO DOUBT
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪
♪ YES, PLEASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO YOUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪

♪ THAT'S WHAT I SAID ♪
♪ AHH ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪
♪ IN YOUR WILDEST DREAMS ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪
♪ AHH ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE WHAT YOU
WANT BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪
♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING IS NOT ♪
♪ WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY-ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

YOU KNOW HOW
REGULAR WIZARD MAIL

CAN SOMETIMES TAKE
UP TO AN HOUR?

WELL, WE NOW HAVE
WIPS--

WIZARD INSTANT
PARCEL SERVICE.

YOU CAN
SEND MAIL INSTANTLY.
YOU MEAN, LIKE E-MAIL.

NO, NO, NO, NO.
LET ME SHOW YOU.

YOU DO IT
WITH THIS. HUH?

AN OLD KEY. WOW.
Max: OOH.

OK, MAKE FUN,
YOU CLOWNS.
BUT WATCH THIS.

HERE, ALEX,
TAKE THIS KEY
AND GO OVER THERE.
NOW,

OPEN A PORTAL
MAIL SLOT IN MIDAIR.
REALLY? OK.

IF YOU SAY  MAILIS SPONTANEIS, 
FOLLOWED BY NAME OR A PLACE,

THE ENVELOPE WILL GO THERE.
HERE, SEND THIS TO JUSTIN.

UH,  MAILIS SPONTANEIS 
JUSTIN RUSSO.

IT WORKED.
HEY, THAT WAS FAST.

IT'S A MESSENGER PIGEON
FROM WIZ TECH.
YOU KNOW, IN MY DAY,
THESE WERE REAL.

THEY'VE ACCEPTED ME FOR
SUMMER BOARDING SCHOOL.

WELL, OF COURSE
THEY ACCEPTED YOU.
WHO ELSE WOULD WANT TO GO?

LOTS OF PEOPLE.
IF YOU GET INTO WIZ TECH,

YOU'RE A SURE WIN
FOR TRANSYLVANIA STATE.

[GASPS]
YOU MEAN, IT GETS BETTER?

AND YOU KNOW THE BEST PART
ABOUT WIZ TECH?

I GET A WHOLE SUMMER
AWAY FROM, UH, YOU KNOW WHO.

I KNOW YOU MEAN ME,
AND THAT'S TOTALLY UNFAIR.
OH!

AWESOME! HEY,
LET'S SCARE JUSTIN AGAIN.
HEH HEH HEH.

OK, I THINK YOU HAVE
EVERYTHING YOU NEED
FOR WIZ TECH.

OH, AND I PACKED
YOUR NEW SCHOOL UNIFORM--
A BRAND-NEW WIZARD ROBE.

OH, NO, MOM,
THEY SWITCHED TO
BLACK BATHROBES.

THE OLD ROBES WERE
TOO FORMAL FOR THESE
MODERN CASUAL TIMES.

OK, THEN, WE'LL JUST
RUN OUT AND GET YOU A BATHROBE.

OH! AND WE SHOULD GET HIM
SOME TURKEY JERKY
FOR THE LONG TRIP.

JERRY, JUSTIN DOESN'T LIKE
TURKEY JERKY. YOU DO.

WOULD IT HURT US TO GET
A LITTLE TURKEY JERKY?

HEY, ALEX, UH, YOU MISSED
A LITTLE SPOT RIGHT THERE.

WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
IT'S THE ONLY SPOT IN THIS HOUSE

THAT DOESN'T HAVE
YOUR JUNK ALL OVER IT.

AND WE'RE TAKING YOUR
BROTHER SHOPPING.
AND BY THE TIME WE GET BACK,

I EXPECT YOU TO HAVE
ALL YOUR STUFF
BACK UP IN YOUR ROOM.

[SIGHS]
OK.

COME ON, MAX.
YOU GOT A LOT OF
CLEANING UP TO DO.

NO, NO, NO, NO. YOUR MESS,
YOUR RESPONSIBILITY.
UHH.

MAN, GETTING ALL THIS
STUFF BACK IN MY ROOM
IS GONNA TAKE FOREVER.
OR NOT.

THIS WILL BE EASY.
I'LL JUST SEND ALL MY STUFF
BACK TO MY ROOM.

MAILIS SPONTANEIS 
 ALEX RUSSO'S BEDROOM.

HEY, THAT THING IS
KIND OF LIKE A BIG VACUUM.

YEAH. LET ME SEE
IF I CAN MOVE IT AROUND.

AWESOME! I'LL BE DONE
IN, LIKE, 5 MINUTES.
MOM AND DAD WILL NEVER--

UM, THAT'S A LITTLE CLEANER
THAN I WAS GOING FOR.

I'D RUN AWAY RIGHT NOW,
BUT I DON'T KNOW WHERE TO GO.
DAD'S GONNA HAVE A COW...

AND A SHEEP,
AND A PIG, AND A GOAT,
WHEN HE SEES ALL THIS.
[KEYS JINGLING]
HIDE!
AW, NEVER MIND.

BOY, I REALLY LOVE
THIS TURKEY JERKY.

IT SURE MAKES ME
THIRSTY, THOUGH.

THERESA, WHY CAN'T
I OPEN THE FRIDGE?
'CAUSE IT'S NOT THERE?
AAH!
[STAMMERS]

OH, WHAT DID YOU DO?
UH...

DADDY, LET ME
JUST CUT TO IT.

[STAMMERING]
UNH! PORTAL...
AAH!
[CAR HONKS]

OK, THIS IS
THE LAST OF IT.

WHAT ARE WE GONNA DO
WITH YOU, ALEX?

YOU HAVE TO LEARN
TO STOP USING MAGIC
AS A SHORTCUT TO EVERYTHING.
YOU ARE SO UNDISCIPLINED.

THAT'S WHY I CAN'T WAIT
TO GET TO WIZ TECH,

WHERE EVERYONE IS SO MUCH MORE
SERIOUS ABOUT MAGIC.

ALL SUMMER LONG,
I'LL BE IN CLASSES THAT
FOCUS ON THE CRAFT OF MAGIC

AND USING IT RESPECTFULLY,
THE WAY IT'S MEANT TO BE.
RIGHT DAD?

WHY ARE GUYS LOOKING AT ME
LIKE I JUST GAVE YOU AN IDEA?

PLEASE DON'T TELL ME
 HE JUST GAVE YOU AN IDEA.

CAN SOMEONE TELL ME
WHAT THE IDEA IS?
[INDISTINCT CHATTERING]
OH.

THIS IS A TERRIBLE IDEA
BRINGING ALEX HERE TO WIZ TECH.

JUSTIN, I KNOW
YOU HAD YOUR HEART SET

ON GETTING AWAY
FROM YOUR SISTER,

BUT THIS COULD REALLY
BE GOOD FOR HER...
AND GOOD FOR ALL OF US.

DON'T WORRY, JUSTIN.
THIS IS A BIG PLACE.

I'M SURE YOU AND ALEX
WILL HARDLY
SEE EACH OTHER.
JUSTIN AND ALEX RUSSO?

I'M DR. EVILINI.
YOU WILL BOTH BE IN MY CLASS.

OOH! HERE ARE
YOUR SPECTACLES.
AW, SWEET!

YOU KNOW, WITH THOSE GLASSES
AND THAT ROBE ON,

YOU REMIND ME OF SOMEONE.
 IS IT TERRY SOMETHING?

BARRY SOMETHING?
LARRY SOMETHING?
OH, NEVER MIND.

WHAT KIND OF POWERS
DO THESE GLASSES GIVE YOU?

NONE. THEY JUST LOOK WONDERFUL
WITH THE BLACK BATHROBES.

GREAT. WE'RE
ACCESSORIZING UGLY.

MOM, DAD, PLEASE DON'T
MAKE ME STAY.

YEAH, PLEASE DON'T
MAKE HER STAY.

COME ON, GUYS.
THE TIME WILL FLY.

OH, AND JUSTIN,
HERE IS THE PORTAL KEY.

IF YOU GET HOMESICK,
JUST SEND US A NOTE.

WH-WHAT ABOUT ME?
CAN I USE THE PORTAL KEY
TO SEND YOU A NOTE?

YEAH, WE'VE SEEN ENOUGH OF YOU
AND THE PORTAL KEY.

DON'T WORRY, HONEY.
OUR KIDS WILL BE FINE.

I'M NOT WORRIED ABOUT OUR KIDS.
I'M WORRIED ABOUT
THE OTHER KIDS.
ALEX IS THERE.
MAX, WHAT'S ALL THIS?

WELL, NOW THAT
I'M AN ONLY CHILD,
WE CAN DO ALL THAT STUFF

THAT WE'VE BEEN
TOO BUSY TO DO.

DAD, WHAT DO YOU
WANT TO START WITH?
UH...NAP.

BIKE RIDING AROUND
CENTRAL PARK?
A NAP.

WELL, HOW ABOUT--
A NAP.

JERRY...
WHAT? OK.
OK.

MAX, UH, LET'S START WITH
WHAT YOU WANT TO DO MOST.

CAMPING.
CAMPING?

[CHUCKLES]
THAT'S A GOOD ONE.
GIVE ME THAT.

OH, COME ON!
YOU'RE CITY GUYS.

YOU'RE IDEA OF ROUGHING IT
IS WHEN THEY DELIVER
CHINESE FOOD
WITHOUT THE FORTUNE COOKIES.

DAD, YOU SMELL THAT?
HEH. [SNIFFS]

OH, IT SMELLS LIKE
A CHALLENGE.

[SNIFFS] WITH A HINT OF
QUESTIONING OUR MANHOOD.

YOU KNOW, WE COULD ROUGH IT
IF WE WANTED TO.

IT'S JUST, WE DON'T.
BECAUSE...

THERE'S NO WILDERNESS
AROUND HERE.

OH, WELL, WE CAN
CAMP ON THE TERRACE.

TERRACE? HEH.
ONE NIGHT OUT THERE

MIGHT AS WELL BE AN EPISODE
OF  SURVIVOR  FOR YOU TWO.

OH, YEAH? WE COULD
SPEND ONE...
2.
3 NIGHTS ON THE TERRACE.

OR EVEN A WHOLE WEEK.
UH,

I THINK 3 NIGHTS
WILL DO IT, BUDDY.

OK, CAMPERS,
3 NIGHTS ON THE TERRACE--
YOU COME INSIDE, YOU LOSE.

YOU ARE ON.
YEAH.
FINE, BOYS.

ENJOY EVERYTHING
MOTHER NATURE HAS TO OFFER.
[HELICOPTER WHIRRING]

Man: YOU THERE ON THE TERRACE,
HAVE YOU SEEN A STOCKY MALE,

LATE THIRTIES, RUNNING WITH
A SACK FULL OF MONEY?
NO!
ARE YOU LOCKED OUT?
NO!

HAS YOUR MANHOOD
BEEN CALLED INTO QUESTION?

YES!
YES!
HANG IN THERE, GUYS.
ANYBODY?
ANYBODY?

THANK YOU, DR. EVILINI.
THAT WOULD BE
THE LITHUANIAN LETHAL LAMP,

KNOWN FOR THEIR ANACONDA-LIKE
ELECTRICAL CORDS.

EXCELLENT.
SO, EVERYONE BEWARE!
[CACKLES]
THAT SOUNDED SCARY.
TOPNOTCH, RUSSO.

YOU REALLY HAVE A GRASP
ON VENOMOUS FURNITURE.
DON'T YOU AGREE, CLASS?
NICE JOB.

WHAT? ONLY ONE BAR
IN THE WIZARD WORLD?
THIS STINKS.

I'LL TAKE THAT.
OH...

FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR NUMBER,
SO WE DON'T LOSE TOUCH--
YEAH, OK.
[CHUCKLING]

WHAT'S WITH YOU
AND THE TINY STUFF?

OH, I COME FROM
A FAMILY OF GIANTS,

BUT I'M KIND OF
THE RUNT OF THE LITTER,

SO MOM AND DAD SORT OF HAVE ME
WITH MINIATURE THINGS

SO MY SELF-ESTEEM
 DOESN'T GET BRUISED.
AND YOU'RE OK WITH THAT?
UH, SURE,

EXCEPT THIS TINY UNDERWEAR
RIDES UP A LOT.
I'M HUGH,
HUGH NORMOUS.
NOT REALLY.

THAT NEW GUY JUSTIN
IS PRETTY COOL, HUH?

YEAH, THE COOLEST.
WATCH THIS.

Dr. Evilini:
NOT ONLY IS IT KNOWN FOR
ITS HIGHLY VENOMOUS VAPORS,
IT ALSO ENGULFS ITS VICTIMS.

UH, THAT WOULD BE
THE BRUSH ROMINE
BEANBAG CHAIR.
IMPRESSIVE, RUSSO.
"LOVE, ALEX."
YEAH. HEH.

MISS RUSSO,
I GET THE FEELING

YOU'RE TOO UNDISCIPLINED
TO APPRECIATE
WHAT WIZ TECH HAS TO OFFER.
AND I GET THE FEELING

THAT YOU PEOPLE
HERE AT WIZ TECH DON'T GET ME.

PERHAPS THIS
WILL GET YOUR ATTENTION.

OW! THOSE "J"s
ARE LIKE FISHHOOKS.
SUMMER HAS JUST BEGUN, RUSSO.

HEY, JUSTIN, HOW DID YOU LIKE
MY EXPLODING NOTE?

I THOUGHT IT WAS A BLAST.
HEH HEH HEH!

WELL, NO ONE ELSE DID.
MESSING WITH ME

DIDN'T TURN OUT
LIKE YOU THOUGHT, DID IT?

EVERYONE AROUND HERE
THINKS I'M COOL

AND THEY THINK
YOU'RE A LOSER.

A LOSER?
WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
PEOPLE LOVE HANGING OUT WITH ME.

HEY, WHO WANTS
TO HAVE LUNCH WITH ME?
[STUDENTS BOO]
I'LL HAVE LUNCH WITH YOU.

I HOPE YOU LIKE
BABY CORN, BABY CARROTS,
AND TINY MUGS OF JUICE.

YEAH, HAVE FUN WITH
THE REALLY TINY GIANT.

OH, YEAH? WELL, LET'S SEE
HOW BIG MAN ON CAMPUS
FITS IN WITH THIS.

FROM YOUR CHIN TO YOUR TOES,
AN ELEPHANT TRUNK GROWS.
RUSSO!

UM, THAT REALLY WASN'T
MEANT FOR YOU. SORRY.

BUT CLEARLY,
THIS IS MEANT FOR ME.
[STUDENTS LAUGHING]

GOT ANY 4s?
GO FISH.
YOU GOT ANY 2s?

[WINGS FLAPPING]
GO FISH.
[BIRDS COOING]

I AIN'T FISHING
IN THAT POND.

I'VE SUMMONED JUSTIN RUSSO
AS YOU REQUESTED, DR. EVILINI.

AHEM. UH, YOU WANTED
TO SEE ME?

YES. PICK UP
THAT PEDADDLE.
UH, WHY?
OOH! OOH! WHAT? WHA...
JUST AS I THOUGHT--

IT HAS BEEN WRITTEN THAT
GREAT TWELVEBALL PLAYERS
TURN INTO GREAT WIZARDS,

AND YOU JUST MIGHT
BE ONE.
[CACKLES]

WHAT WERE WE
TALKING ABOUT?

UH, TWELVEBALL?
WHAT'S TWELVEBALL?
IT LOOKS LIKE PING PONG.

OH, IT'S NOTHING
LIKE PING PONG.

THESE BALLS
ARE ADDED ONE BY ONE

WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF
12 BEING PLAYED
SIMULTANEOUSLY.

ONLY ONE STUDENT
HAS EVER REACHED 11 BALLS

HERE AT WIZ TECH.
WHO'S THAT?

JERKO PHOENIX.
YOU'LL MEET HIM...
IN DUE TIME, MY BOY.

DUE TIME!
[CACKLES]

OOH. THAT SOUNDED
MYSTERIOUS.

WHAT DO YOU SAY?
ARE YOU UP TO IT?

I AM.
I AM UP TO THE CHALLENGE.
[CACKLES AND COUGHS]

[RASPY VOICE]
AHEM. GONNA GET SOME WATER.
[ROCK MUSIC PLAYING]
♪ NOW I FEEL IT ♪
♪ NOW I FEEL IT ♪
♪ NOW I FEEL IT ♪
♪ NOW I FEEL IT ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT? ♪
♪ AIN'T WE PERFECT NOW... ♪

WOW.
WHAT'S THE BIG DEAL?

HE'S THE BEST I'VE EVER SEEN.
OHH...

THIS IS THE WORST
BEST FRIEND EVER.
W-WAIT UP, ALEX.

MR. RUSSO, IT'S TIME
FOR YOU TO TAKE ON

THE VERY BEST
TWELVEBALL PLAYER
HERE AT WIZ TECH

IN A NONBINDING
SCRIMMAGE.

JUSTIN RUSSO, MEET--
JERKO PHOENIX.

JERKO? THAT MUST BE
A TOUGH NAME
TO GROW UP WITH.

YOU KNOW, I HAD A COUSIN
WHOSE NAME WAS KIM.

WELL, KIM WAS A GUY,
SO I'M SURE YOU CAN
IMAGINE PEOPLE--
ENOUGH!
I'M HERE TO WARN YOU

THAT I PLAN ON WINNING THE TITLE
OF MR. TWELVEBALL.

WHAT'S UP WITH
YOUR EYE?
TWELVEBALL ACCIDENT?

THERE'S NOTHING WRONG
WITH MY EYE.

THIS GETS ME OUT OF
WEARING THOSE STUPID GLASSES.
[THUNDER]
MMM.
[THUNDER]
[GASPS]

IT'S BEEN RAINING ALL NIGHT,
AND THEY'RE
EATING WEEDS AGAIN.
THAT'S IT. GAME OVER.
YEAH.
HEH.
HELP! MOUSE!
JERRY! HELP!

MOM, ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
WHAT HAPPENED?

I SAW A RAT.
IT'S UNDER THE COUCH.

I SAW A RAT.
A RAT?
YOU GUYS, HELP! NOW!
UH...HYAH.
UH...
IT'S UNDER THE...OK.
AAH!
WELL, THE TAIL LOOKS LIKE A--

A RAT, JERRY.
IT'S A RAT.
OH.

THAT'S IT.
Y-YOU GUYS CAN'T
STAY OUT THERE ANYMORE.

YOU GUYS WIN.
I NEED YOU IN HERE.
THANKS.
MAX, CAMPING TRIP IS OVER.

WE GOTTA BE IN HERE
TO PROTECT OUR LITTLE LADY.

YOU KNOW HOW WEAK
WOMEN CAN BE.

DON'T PUSH IT.
SORRY.

OH! I--I GOTTA PUT
THIS LITTLE GUY BACK
IN HIS NATURAL HABITAT--
THE SUBWAY.

HEY, MOM, THAT WAS REALLY
A POTATO, WASN'T IT?
YEAH.

DO YOU HAVE ANY MORE?
'CAUSE I'M STARVING.

SURE, BABY. HOW DO YOU
WANT YOUR RAT?
MASHED OR FRIED?

[THUD]
[WHISPERING] Shh!
[THUD]
[THUDDING]

[SIGHS]
This door is locked, too?
YES, I AM.
[HUMMING]
ALEX...

WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
IT'S BATH NIGHT.

OH, JUST CHITCHATTING
WITH THE DOOR.

HEY, JUSTIN, YOU KNOW
THE PORTAL KEY
DAD GAVE YOU?

I NEED IT. I WANT
TO SEND SOMETHING HOME.
OH, OK.
WAIT.

WHY DO YOU HAVE
YOUR SUITCASE?

UM, I JUST WANT MOM
TO DO SOME LAUNDRY FOR ME.

HEY, YOU'RE TRYING
TO SEND YOURSELF HOME.

OK, SO, WHAT DO YOU CARE?
YOU LOVE ALL THE WORK
IN THIS PLACE?

I CAN'T STAND IT.
I'M OUT OF HERE.
ALEX, YOU CAN'T LEAVE.
OH, YEAH? WATCH ME.

MAILIS SPONTANEIS 
 RUSSO HOME.
ALEX...
HERE, HUGH.

I DO APPRECIATE
THE HELP WITH THE MAIL.

OH, YOU'RE WELCOME.
BUT IT'S A LITTLE LONELY.

I WISH MY NEW FRIEND ALEX
WOULD DROP BY ONCE IN A WHILE.

HEY, EVERYBODY!
I'M HO...SED.

ALEX!
Justin: ALEX!

ALL MAIL GOES THROUGH
DR. EVILINI.

I GUESS
YOU KNOW THAT NOW.

ALEX RUSSO...
TRYING TO RUN AWAY

INSTEAD OF FACING UP
TO THE CHALLENGES
OF WIZ TECH...

I CAN SEE I'M GOING
TO HAVE TO PULL OUT
THE OLD DISCIPLINE BUCKET.
THE WHO?
[SIGHS]

OH, SHE WASN'T KIDDING.
THERE REALLY IS
A DISCIPLINE BUCKET.
I HATE THIS PLACE.
KEEP SCRUBBING.

ARE YOU SURE
YOU'VE GOT THE MESSAGE?
YES.

GOOD. THEN TAKE IT
STRAIGHT TO MY MOTHER.

SHE'LL FINALLY
BE PROUD OF ME.

NOW, GO, MESSENGER FISH.
FLOP LIKE THE WIND!
OW, OW, OW, OW,
OW, OW, OW, OW, OW.
HEY, I JUST SCRUBBED THERE.
DEAR MAMA,

AFTER THE TWELVEBALL
TOURNAMENT REVEALS
THE BEST YOUNG WIZARD,

I WILL DRAIN
THAT WIZARD'S POWERS
AND TAKE THEM FOR MYSELF,

MAKING ME THE MOST POWERFUL
WIZARD EVER!
LOVE, MARY BETH EVILINI.

JUSTIN'S GONNA GET
HIS POWERS DRAINED.
♪ DUN, DUN, DUN ♪

OHH. THIS PLACE
IS A FREAK SHOW.
Alex: OK, LET'S REVIEW.

THEY'VE ACCEPTED ME FOR
SUMMER BOARDING SCHOOL.

PLEASE DON'T TELL ME
HE JUST GAVE YOU AN IDEA.

MOM, DAD, PLEASE DON'T
MAKE ME STAY.

YEAH, PLEASE DON'T
MAKE HER STAY.
TRYING TO RUN AWAY

INSTEAD OF FACING UP
TO THE CHALLENGES
OF WIZ TECH...

IT HAS BEEN WRITTEN THAT
GREAT TWELVEBALL PLAYERS
TURN INTO GREAT WIZARDS.

WOW. HE'S THE BEST
I'VE EVER SEEN.

JUSTIN'S GONNA GET
HIS POWERS DRAINED.

SO, EVERYONE BEWARE!
[CACKLES]
